title: Web-Based Problem-Centered Learning for Pharmacological Treatment of Mental Disorders

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary pharmaceutical knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Large-Scale Smartphone-Centric Vocational Training in Resource-Limited Settings

learning_goals: Learners can establish symptom management and pharmacological treatment plans for patients with mental disorders.
Learners can develop strategies for managing drug interactions and side effects based on real-world cases.
Learners can revise treatment plans by incorporating peer feedback through web-based discussions and collaboration.

resources: Mental health video lectures and patient interview materials
Digital medication therapy guidelines and reference links
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
